mapper.update: update second_por set sec_name = #{secName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, portfolio_name = #{portfolioName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sec_status = #{secStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sec_createtime = #{secCreatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sec_updatetime = #{secUpdatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sec_editor = #{secEditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sec_createman = #{secCreateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sec_spare = #{secSpare,jdbcType=INTEGER} where second_por_id = #{secondPorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select second_por_id, sec_name, portfolio_name, sec_status, sec_createtime, sec_updatetime, sec_editor, sec_createman, sec_spare from second_por where second_por_id = #{secondPorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select second_por_id, sec_name, portfolio_name, sec_status, sec_createtime, sec_updatetime, sec_editor, sec_createman, sec_spare from second_por order by sec_spare
select second_por_id, sec_name, portfolio_name, sec_status, sec_createtime, sec_updatetime, sec_editor, sec_createman, sec_spare from second_por where sec_status=#{secStatus} order by sec_spare
